Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()

setController

boolean setController(ServoController controller)
Attach a servo controller to the servo. The servo and servo controller "should be in the same instance of MRL and this reference to another service should be ok. The servo controller uses this method to pass a reference of itself to the servo, to be used directly.

move

void move(java.lang.Float offset)
The command accepts a parameter of offset which can be of the range -1.0 to 1.0. Negative values are in one direction and positive values are in the opposite value. For example -1.0 would be maximum offset in a counter clock-wise direction and 0.9 would be 90% offset in a clockwise direction. 0.0 of course would be stop

Parameters:
offset - - new offset

moveTo

void moveTo(java.lang.Integer newPos)
moveTo moves the servo to a specific location. Typically, a servo has 0 to 180 positions

Parameters:
newPos -
